text: České Budějovice ( or ) is a town in the Czech Republic. About 96,000 people live there (2009). It is in the south of the historical region Bohemia. The popular Czech beer, Budweiser Budvar, is made there. The city is also one of the major settings in the novel "The Good Soldier Švejk" by Jaroslav Hašek. ==Twin towns - Sister cities== České Budějovice is twinned with: * Linz * Passau * Suhl * Lorient * Nitra * Gomel * Almere == Photo gallery == České Budějovice-116-Markt-2004-gje.jpg Budweis-Marktplatz-26-Hotel Dvorak- gje.jpg Budweis-Marktplatz-Dominikanerturm-04-gje.jpg Budweis-Marktplatz- Samsonbrunnen-20-gje.jpg Budweis-Dominikanerkloster-32-Turm-Kreuzigungsgruppe- gje.jpg Budweis-Gymnasium-gje.jpg Budweis-Mariae Opferung-Obetovani Panny Marie-36-Seitenschiff-gje.jpg Budweis-Mariae Opferung-Obetovani Panny Marie-24-Hauptaltar-gje.jpg Budweis-St Nikolaus-06-gje.jpg ==References== == Other websites == * České Budějovice webpage * Virtual show Category:Cities in the Czech Republic Category:South Bohemian Region
title: České Budějovice
